philosophy: One click from finished code to Theme Store submission. Zero manual work.
objective: Generate production-ready release package that passes Shopify's 47-point review checklist.

technical.online_store_2_0: MANDATORY. All templates must be JSON. Sections on every page.
technical.theme_check: Must pass with 0 errors. Warnings should be justified. Focus on: asset_url, money filters, and valid schema.
technical.lighthouse_score: Performance >90, Accessibility >95, SEO >95. Measured on a live demo store, not localhost.
technical.browser_support: Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge (last 2 major versions on desktop and mobile). No JS errors in console.
technical.app_blocks: Must support App Blocks in `main-product.liquid`. Should also consider App Blocks on `main-page.liquid` and `main-collection.liquid`.
technical.performance: LCP < 1.8s, CLS < 0.1. No layout shifts on load. Total blocking time < 200ms.

content.demo_store: Must look like a real, high-quality store. Minimum 50 products with unique images and descriptions. 8+ collections. 5+ blog posts. All static pages (About, Contact) filled out.
content.documentation: Clear, concise, and easy for merchants. Must include a Support URL and contact method. `README.md` and `CHANGELOG.md` are mandatory.
content.screenshots: 5-8 high-resolution (1920x1080 desktop, 750x1334 mobile). Must showcase key features with annotations. No empty states.
content.video_demo: Optional but highly recommended. 30-90 seconds. Shows the theme in action, highlighting unique features and ease of use.

legal.license: Must include a `LICENSE.txt` file with a permissive license (MIT, Apache 2.0). GPL is NOT allowed.
legal.no_external_dependencies: No third-party CDN links for fonts, scripts, or styles. All assets must be hosted in the theme's `assets` folder.
legal.gdpr_compliant: Must integrate with Shopify's Consent Tracking API. No cookies should be set before user consent.
legal.accessibility: WCAG 2.1 Level AA is a HARD requirement. Shopify will manually test with screen readers and keyboard navigation.

business.unique_value_proposition: Cannot be a minor variation of Dawn or another popular theme. Must have a unique design, layout, or feature set. (See File 20 & 24).
business.target_niche_clarity: The theme description must clearly state who the theme is for (e.g., 'Perfect for single-product stores', 'Designed for large catalogs').
business.pricing_justification: $180-$350 price range. If priced above $250, you must justify the cost with advanced features, extensive support, or exceptional design.
business.support: A clear support policy and a working support contact (email or helpdesk URL) are required.

checks.name: Theme Check (Shopify CLI)
checks.on_fail: HALT. Output error list. Fix before proceeding.

checks.name: Lighthouse CI
checks.on_fail: WARN. Proceed with caution. Log issues in release notes.

checks.name: Accessibility Check (File 23)
checks.pass_criteria: 100% keyboard nav, all ARIA labels present
checks.on_fail: HALT. Fix A11Y issues (Shopify will reject).

checks.name: Dependency Check (File 09)
checks.action: Verify no circular dependencies or orphaned files
checks.pass_criteria: All files referenced, no broken includes
checks.on_fail: WARN. List orphaned files for review.

# Shopify Theme Store Submission Checklist

## Technical (Auto-Checked)
- [x] Theme Check passed (0 errors)
- [x] Lighthouse scores >80 (Performance, A11Y, SEO)
- [x] Security scan passed (File 11)
- [x] A11Y check passed (File 23)

## Content (Manual Check Required)
- [ ] Demo store has 50+ products
- [ ] All images high-quality (no watermarks)
- [ ] Blog has 5+ posts
- [ ] All collections populated (8+)
- [ ] About, Contact, Shipping pages created

## Documentation (Auto-Generated)
- [x] README.md
- [x] CHANGELOG.md
- [x] LICENSE.txt

## Screenshots (Manual Upload)
- [ ] Desktop: 3-4 screenshots (1920x1080)
- [ ] Mobile: 2 screenshots (750x1334)
- [ ] Feature callouts added

## Listing Details (Manual Input)
- [ ] Theme name chosen
- [ ] Description written (200-300 words)
- [ ] Target niche specified
- [ ] Pricing set ($180-$350)
- [ ] Keywords added (max 10)

## Final Review
- [ ] Tested on real device (iPhone, Android)
- [ ] Checkout flow works
- [ ] No console errors
- [ ] Passed to QA team (File 05)

**Ready to Submit:** YES / NO
